item.title: Workflow Management with rose/cylc
item.description: This page provides is an overview of Met Office tools (Rose, Cylc and FCM) that are installed on JASMIN for running and managing suites on the LOTUS cluster.

item.title: Using Cron
item.description: Cron is a very common job scheduler for linux. It allows users to run the same command or shell script periodically.
